    protected void
    handleTie()
    If a tie is found, then we perform a tie break by using the SecureRandom class.SecureRandom is designed to be a cryptographically secure random number generator and should help ensure that we are choosing candidates fairly by essentially simulating a “coin toss” where each tied candidate has an equal probability of being chosen as the winner.

  • Constructor Details

    • IRVoting

      public IRVoting(String candidateLine, ArrayList<String> ballotList, String auditFilePath)
      Constructor that initializes the important variables needed for this class.
      Parameters:
      candidateLine - - String that contains candidate name and party affiliation information.
      ballotList - - Arraylist of ballots parsed from the CSV file where each element contains the voter's preference for a candidate.
      auditFilePath - - Name and path of the audit file that is generated when running the entire system.

  • Method Details

    • calculateBallots

      public void calculateBallots()
      This function is the entry point for our ballot calulcations and calls other private functions for checking if a majority or tie has arrived after the first round of calulcations, or if redistribution needs to be performed to declare a winner

    • checkTie

      protected boolean checkTie()
      This function checks if all non-eliminated candidates are currently tied.
      Overrides:
      checkTie in class Voting
      Returns:
      - True if election is currently tied; otherwise, False

    • handleTie

      protected void handleTie()
      If a tie is found, then we perform a tie break by using the SecureRandom class.SecureRandom is designed to be a cryptographically secure random number generator and should help ensure that we are choosing candidates fairly by essentially simulating a “coin toss” where each tied candidate has an equal probability of being chosen as the winner.
      Overrides:
      handleTie in class Voting

    • writeToAuditFile

      protected void writeToAuditFile(StringBuilder sb)
      Write StringBuilder content to the audit file. This function is helpful for writing first round of calculation information, tie information and vote redistribution information to the audit file.
      Overrides:
      writeToAuditFile in class Voting
      Parameters:
      sb - - StringBuilder object containing the content to be written to the audit file.

    • buildAndWriteInitialResultsToAuditFile

      protected void buildAndWriteInitialResultsToAuditFile()
      This function is useful for building the string that details the number/% of votes a candidate scored as well as the candidate's name and party affiliation.
      Overrides:
      buildAndWriteInitialResultsToAuditFile in class Voting

    • buildAndWriteTieResultToAuditFile

      protected void buildAndWriteTieResultToAuditFile()
      This function is useful for building the string that details result of a tie to the audit file
      Overrides:
      buildAndWriteTieResultToAuditFile in class Voting

    • getCandidates

      public ArrayList<Candidate> getCandidates()
      Returns the list of candidates.
      Returns:
      - List of candidates who participated in the election.

    • getBallots

      public ArrayList<ArrayList<Candidate>> getBallots()
      Returns list of ballots.
      Returns:
      - List of ballots where each element is an arraylist of candidates ordered by voter preference.
